ygData.subject: A mutant, a wolf, and a fox walked into a bar.
ygData.msgSnippet: Foxfingers and Razor Claw reached the outside of the Black fortress. The relays and mirror sensors were in place. Other than dumb luck there was no easy way

Foxfingers and Razor Claw reached the outside of the Black fortress. The re=
lays and mirror sensors were in place. Other than dumb luck there was no ea=
sy way for the Preds to trace Lunarpines message. Remaining thourough Foxfi=
ngers set a few small charges around the outside of the base. He hoped that=
 diplomacy would work but had plan B ready just in case.

Lunarpine recieve=
d the all clear signal from the sly fox. He set his comm on a basic Predaco=
n frequency and recorded a message. "Your attention please, My name is Luna=
rpine, recently a member of my group accidentally wandered into your vacini=
ty, since there has been no sign of her in a week it's safe to figure that =
she is involentarily your guest. I hope we can reach a diplomatic understan=
ding and negotiate her release." he paused to let the message sink in, "You=
 may respond on the same frequency that I have contacted you." The former M=
aximal fealt that honesty was the best way he could think of to get thier a=
ttention, He'd mentioned his name but not his loyalties, those two facts wo=
uld point that he was out of the Maximals but would still have connections =
with them.
